amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to enlist DACA aliens in the military, who are currently only considered eligible through the MAVNI program as a result of a September 2014 memo from the administration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 26 printed in House Report 114-623 to prohibit funds from being used by this Act to enlist DACA aliens in the military, who are currently only considered eligible through the MAVNI program as a result of a September 2014 memo from the administration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 211 (Roll no. 317).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 211 (Roll no. 317).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Gosar.
